channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiClientEMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiClientEMS

item.title: CVE-2021-24019|2024-08-03T19:14:10.075Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20forticlientems
item.description: An insufficient session expiration vulnerability [CWE- 613] in FortiClientEMS versions 6.4.2 and below, 6.2.8 and below may allow an attacker to reuse the unexpired admin user session IDs to gain admin privileges, should the attacker be able to obtain that session ID (via other, hypothetical attacks)
